level.heading: BOARD APPROVAL OF BARBER AND COSMETOLOGY SCHOOLS (ยง 17-3723)

level.text: All schools are required to be licensed by the Education Licensure Commission, as set forth in 16 DCMR Chapter 12.
All schools must maintain a current license from the Education Licensure Commission.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 7699 (September 12, 2003); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 7559 (July 11, 2008).
